title: Sony WH-CH520 Best Wireless Bluetooth On-Ear Headphones with Microphone for Calls and Voice Control, Up to 50 Hours Battery Life with Quick Charge Function, Includes USB-C Charging Cable - Black
description: Immerse yourself in high-quality sound with the Sony WH-CH520 Wireless On-Ear Headphones.
Perfect for music lovers and commuters, these headphones offer exceptional audio performance with deep bass and clear trebles, providing an enhanced listening experience for all your favorite tunes.
The Sony WH-CH520 features advanced Bluetooth technology

for seamless wireless connectivity with your devices. With up to 50 hours of battery life on a single charge, these headphones ensure you enjoy uninterrupted music throughout your longest days. Quick charging provides up to 90 minutes of playback from just a 10-minute charge, so you’re always ready to go.

, the lightweight on-ear design and adjustable headband provide a secure and comfortable fit for all-day wear. The soft ear cushions enhance comfort, making these headphones perfect for extended listening sessions at home, at work, or on the go.
Stay connected with built-in hands-free calling and voice assistant compatibility.

The WH-CH520 features an integrated microphone for clear calls and easy access to Google Assistant and Siri, allowing you to control your music, check the weather, or manage your calendar with simple voice commands.
Easily manage your music and calls with intuitive controls on the earcups.
The WH-CH520's sleek, modern design is available in multiple colors, ensuring they complement any style.
Elevate your audio experience with the Sony WH-CH520 Wireless On-Ear Headphones
– the ideal combination of style, comfort, and performance.
